1310.name: MA 4115
1310.Applications:
Hardfacing shafts from stainless steel parts, molt repairs, rebuilding pump parts, thermal spray etc. Suitable for plating and joining equal and similar ferritic Cr-steels and cast steels. Proper weldings are subject to the recommended heat treatment. This welding wire is specially suitable for sealing surfaces on water-, steamand gas-valves, especially for sulphuric gases. The deposit is resistant to seawater, thin acids and scale resistant in air and oxidizing gases up to 950°C.
The weld deposit can be tempered.
